committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 and the Federal Home Loan Bank Act.
short_title: Savings and Loan Financial Centers Act

summary.text: Savings and Loan Financial Centers Act - Title I: Payment of Interest on Deposits or Accounts - Extends for five and a half years after the enactment of this Act the authority of the Federal Home Loan Bank Board, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, and the Federal Reserve Board to set interest rate limits, including the setting of a differential for certain classes of institutions. Title II: Lending and Investment Powers - Amends the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 to specify the types of investments that federally- chartered savings and loan associations may make. Title III: Third Party Payment Accounts - Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to permit federally-chartered savings and loan associations to offer negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) accounts.

titles.title: Savings and Loan Financial Centers Act
A bill to amend the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933 and the Federal Home Loan Bank Act.
